parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.52
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Weapons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables or disables transport NV (Night Vision). To disable TI (Thermal Imaging) use [[disableTIEquipment]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''disableNVGEquipment''' state

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>myTank [[disableNVGEquipment]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[disableTIEquipment]]
</value></part></template></root>
